concept.description: Labels the module com.buschmais.xo.api as MODULE and CDO_API.
concept.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE) WHERE package.FQN = "com.buschmais.xo.api" SET package:MODULE:CDO_API RETURN package

constraint.description: The module API must have no dependencies to other modules.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (module:MODULE:CDO_API)-[:CONTAINS*]->(type:TYPE), (otherModule:MODULE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(otherType:TYPE), (type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(otherType:TYPE) WHERE module<>otherModule RETURN type as Type, otherType as OtherType
